title: No Compromises!
detail_text: <:th_ch0204/>Hmm...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>U-um, Karin-san...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Huh? What is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Um, I... I was just wondering if this hat would work...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Nope. It might look cute, but I’m sure a different color would look better with your hair color.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>But I’ve tried on so many hats, I don’t know what I’m looking for...!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Then just sit tight and let me handle it, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>...Alright.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Hmhm, that’s a good girl. I’ll make sure to pick out a hat that’ll make you look especially cute, Riko-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Please do!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
